title: What's the best program to download music on Mac? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your best bet for getting decent quality music (ie not off youtube etc) is to use a recognised site like Iomoio, their music is dirt cheap (16 cents a song, often cheaper with discounts). Not only are you getting great music but it's guaranteed to be virus free. You can try them out for free as well so see if you like it (you will!) http://www.iomoio.net/bonus.php
